cause.description:
to help SAT camp suvivors rehabilitate themselves into the world, they were exposed to very "hippie" like rituals and acts. they even were apart of a rite of pride, by singing an african song of happiness. help these brave souls with their return to a new life and way of living
1. having a good time
2. enjoying relaxing outdoor activities
3. chillin
cause.name: Support SAT camp survivors
